languages.text: Идира Тласс, чьи неконтролируемые ведьмовские силы были укрощены ксеноустройством, стала покорным инструментом на службе династии фон Валанциус. С каждым годом некогда бойкая и говорливая женщина все больше становилась лишь тенью человека, которым когда-то была. Ее судьба скрылась во мраке меж звезд и неизвестна летописцам.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира добровольно носит пси-дампер

languages.text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.
languages.original_text: Идира Тласс, чьи неконтролируемые ведьмовские силы были укрощены ксеноустройством, стала покорным инструментом на службе династии фон Валанциус. С каждым годом некогда бойкая и говорливая женщина все больше становилась лишь тенью человека, которым когда-то была. Ее судьба скрылась во мраке меж звезд и неизвестна летописцам.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, the psyker, whose uncontrolled Wych powers were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of von Valancious dynasty. With every passing year, the once lively and talkative woman turned more and more into a shadow of her former self. Her fate disappeared in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

Idira Tlass, the psyker, whose uncontrolled Wych powers were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of von Valancious dynasty. With every passing year, the once lively and talkative woman turned more and more into a shadow of her former self. Her fate disappeared in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

Idira Tlass, whose unbridled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more of a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

The once lively and garrulous woman became more of a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

languages.text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯原本无法控制的巫术力量受到某种异形装置的抑制，最终成为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的听话工具。一年又一年过去了，这个曾经活泼健谈的女人变得越来越沉默寡言。她的命运消失在群星之间的黑暗中，编年史家们对此一无所知。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯原本无拘无束的巫术力量受到某种异形装置的抑制，最终成为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的听话工具。这个曾经活泼健谈的女人年复一年，变得越来越沉默寡言。她的命运消失在群星之间的黑暗中，编年史家们对此一无所知。

languages.text: Idira Tlass, ihre unkontrollierten Kräfte der Hexerei durch ein Xenogerät gedämpft, wurde zu einem gefügsamen Instrument im Dienst der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Die einst so lebhafte und geschwätzige Frau verkam mit jedem Jahr mehr und mehr zu einem Schatten ihrer selbst. Irgendwann verschwand sie in den Sternen, die Chronisten wissen nicht, was aus ihr geworden ist.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, ihre ungezügelten Kräfte der Hexerei durch ein Xenogerät gedämpft, wurde zu einem gefügsamen Instrument im Dienst der Dynastie derer von Valancius. Die einst so lebhafte und geschwätzige Frau verkam mit jedem Jahr mehr und mehr zu einem Schatten ihrer selbst. Irgendwann verschwand sie in den Sternen, die Chronisten wissen nicht, was aus ihr geworden ist.

languages.text: Idira Tlass, dont les pouvoirs de sorcellerie furent bridés par un appareil xénos, devint l'instrument docile de la dynastie von Valancius. Autrefois sémillante et loquace, la jeune femme ne devint plus que l'ombre d'elle-même au fil des années. Son histoire fut perdue dans les ténèbres de l'espace, et les chroniqueurs ne parvinrent jamais à en apprendre davantage.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, dont les pouvoirs de sorcellerie furent bridés par un appareil xénos, devint l’instrument docile de la dynastie von Valancius. Autrefois sémillante et loquace, la jeune femme ne devint plus que l'ombre d'elle-même au fil des années. Son histoire fut perdue dans les ténèbres de l'espace, et les chroniqueurs ne parvinrent jamais à en apprendre davantage.

languages.text: Idira Tlass, cuya brujería descontrolada quedó sometida gracias a un xenoartefacto, se convirtió en una herramienta obediente al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius. La mujer, antes animada y parlanchina, se convertía en una sombra cada vez más lejana de quien era con cada año que pasaba. Su destino se perdió en la oscuridad entre las estrellas, y los cronistas desconocen su final.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass, cuya brujería descontrolada quedó sometida gracias a un xenoartefacto, se convirtió en una herramienta obediente al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius. La mujer, antes animada y parlanchina, se convertía en una sombra cada vez más lejana de quien era con cada año que pasaba. Su destino se perdió en la oscuridad entre las estrellas, y los cronistas desconocen su final.

languages.text: イディラ・トラスは、その制御不能な魔術の力をゼノデバイスで鎮めつつ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕える従順な道具となった。かつては快活で饒舌だった女も、年を重ねるごとに以前の面影を失っていった。星々の闇に消えた彼女の運命を、歴史の編纂者たちが知る術はない。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: イディラ・トラスは、その制御不能な魔術の力をゼノデバイスで鎮めつつ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕える従順な道具となった。かつては快活で饒舌だった女も、年を重ねるごとに以前の面影を失っていった。星々の闇に消えた彼女の運命を、歴史の編纂者たちが知る術はない。

languages.text: Kontrol dışı cadılık güçleri bir zeno cihazıyla bastırılan İdira Tlass, von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetindeki itaatkâr bir araca dönüştü. Bir zamanlar hayat dolu ve konuşkan olan kadın, yıllar geçtikçe eski benliğinin bir gölgesinden ibaret kaldı. Ölümüne dair gerçekler, yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkta kaybolduğundan vakanüvisler tarafından kaydedilmedi.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass, whose uncontrolled powers of witchcraft were subdued by a xenodevice, became an obedient instrument in the service of the von Valancius dynasty. The once lively and garrulous woman became more a shadow of her former self with each passing year. Her fate was lost in the darkness among the stars, and chroniclers know nothing of it.

traits.locale_text: Kontrol dışı cadılık güçleri bir zeno cihazıyla bastırılan İdira Tlass, von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetindeki itaatkâr bir araca dönüştü. Bir zamanlar hayat dolu ve konuşkan olan kadın, yıllar geçtikçe eski hâlinin bir gölgesinden ibaret hâle geldi. Sonunun nasıl geldiği bilgisi yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkta kaybedildi. Vakanüvisler bu konuda bir şey bilmiyor.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира добровольно носит пси-дампер
